front.title: Statistics of One-Way Internet Packet Delays

abstract.t: The statistical properties of packet delays for transmission across the Internet are investigated, based on analysis of three datasets obtained using CQOS cNodes, each measured over several days of continuous transmission.Two of these sets comprise high and low bandwidth measurement data for vectors (defined here as a cNode to cNode link) from CQOS headquarters to the Irvine Data Center, while the third is a low-bandwidth dataset obtained from a CQOS-Irvine to London vector.
